title: Session Context
description: Describes the current browsing session, including identification, timing, and engagement metrics.

id.description: A unique identifier for the current session.

startedAt.description: The date and time when the session started.

isNew.description: Whether this is the user's first session.

count.description: The ordinal session number for the user (1 for first session, 2 for second, etc.).

referrer.description: The original referrer URL that initiated the session.

landingPage.description: The URL of the first page viewed in the session.

duration.description: The elapsed session duration in seconds.

pageViews.description: The number of pages viewed during the session.
